invalidAsset.description: This asset details has changed. Please review for your safety.
invalidAsset.modal.title: Review changes
invalidAsset.modal.symbolChanged.descrip: Asset symbols don't usually change. This could be an indication that the asset creator is trying to create the false impression that the asset in question is another asset.
invalidAsset.modal.decimalsChanged.descr: Asset decimals don't usually change. This could be an indication that the asset creator is trying to manipulate the supply in order to inflate the value of the asset.

deposit.howTo.title: How to deposit?
deposit.howTo.qna.title: How to bridge assets into Hydration from a CEX?

deposit.howTo.qna.steps.label: Login to your CEX account
deposit.howTo.qna.steps.description: Log in and check that you’ve got the asset you want to send.

deposit.howTo.qna.steps.label: Select 'Withdraw'
deposit.howTo.qna.steps.description: Hit the “Withdraw” button next to the asset you want to transfer.

deposit.howTo.qna.steps.label: Chose Polkadot network
deposit.howTo.qna.steps.description: Pick Polkadot from the list of tokens.

deposit.howTo.qna.steps.label: Don't have HDX?
deposit.howTo.qna.steps.description: Make sure you are pasting the same wallet as copied below

deposit.howTo.qna.steps.label: Enter the amount
deposit.howTo.qna.steps.description: Just enter how much cryptocurrency you want to send. Keep in mind there’s usually a minimum amount and a fee for withdrawing.

deposit.howTo.infoMessage: Please don’t close this tab while proceeding with your deposit, it might cause unexpected errors. Only click shiny buttons.
